Prerequisite: YIL2201P Intermediate Portuguese 1 or equivalent. Students may need to take a placement exam.
ModuleDescription:
Intermediate Portuguese 2 is designed to increase students’ proficiency in reading, writing, speaking, and overall comprehension of the language. This module is aimed at students who have completed the beginning sequence or have had significant experience with the language. It offers a combination of listening and speaking practice with a review of key concepts of Portuguese grammar via targeted reading and writing activities. This module continues to incorporate cultural elements through representative readings and films.
The course will be conducted in Portuguese via teleconference from Yale.
